cyclone.name: JOSE
cyclone.current_location: about 635 mi ESE of the northern Leeward Islands
cyclone.trajectory: Continuing west-northwest toward the northern Leeward Islands through Saturday, then forecast to turn northwest and remain over the Atlantic east of the Bahamas

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch – Antigua, Barbuda, Anguilla, Sint Maarten, St. Martin; Tropical Storm Watch – Montserrat, St. Kitts, Nevis, Saba, St. Eustatius
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning – Antigua, Barbuda, Anguilla
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northern Leeward Islands from Dominica northward to Anguilla (including US/UK Virgin Islands and Puerto Rico for peripheral effects)
weather_observation.wind: Gusty tropical-storm-force winds (35–45 mph) possible Saturday as the core passes north
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected for St. Croix given forecast track well to the north
weather_observation.rainfall: Bands could drop 2–4 inches, locally higher, Saturday–early Sunday
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous surf and rip currents beginning late Friday
